scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run webpack && npm run pack:linter
scripts.pack:linter: rimraf bundle && mkdir bundle && npm pack --pack-destination bundle
scripts.test: npm run test_main && npm run test_rules && npm run test_regression
scripts.test_main: npm run compile && rimraf test/results && node build/src/TestRunner.js test
scripts.test_regression: npm run compile && rimraf test_regression/results && node build/src/TestRunner.js test_regression
scripts.test_rules: npm run compile && rimraf test_rules/results && node build/src/TestRunner.js test_rules
scripts.fix: npm run prettier-fix && npm run eslint-fix
